channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Newsom vs. the Terminator
item.description: Former California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger is ready to put some muscle into the effort to stop Newsom’s gerrymander plan.

item.title: Inspiring Strong, Lasting Marriages Starts With Celebrating Long Ones Like My Grandparents’
item.description: “Love your spouse and share the Gospel.” Those were the wise words my Poppy uttered to a private dining room packed with his kids, grandkids, and grea...

item.title: 41 Planned Parenthood Facilities And Counting Set To Close As Trump Defunds Abortion Giant
item.description: Planned Parenthood's services outside of abortion have decreased significantly since 2013, while its abortions have dramatically increased.

item.title: Redistricting Isn’t A ‘Threat To Democracy,’ But These 4 Dem Vote-Rigging Tactics Are
item.description: For a party that loves 'democracy,' they sure had no problem trying to remove their opponent from the ballot and strip voters of their right to choose...

item.title: … And Statistics
item.description: The week of July 28, 2025: McEntarfer fired “Pour encourager les autres,” antitrust, tariffs, net zero, and more.

item.title: The American Eagle Saga Only Shows the Woke Left Is Out of Touch
item.description: Hot is no longer toxic, and the normies are back.

item.title: Trump gives Vance nod for MAGA heir in 2028
item.description: President Trump said Tuesday that Vice President J.D. Vance is the "most likely" heir to the MAGA movement and likely the Republican 2028 nominee.

item.title: Homeland Security Committee Member Says She’s Loyal To A Different Homeland
item.description: The founders knew our republic could not survive if its people -- let alone leaders -- were filled with foreign attachments.

item.title: Auto Industry Myths That Belong in the Junkyard
item.description: Rather than needing more government ‘help,’ U.S. automakers are threatened by government intervention.

item.title: BREAKING: DOJ Requests DNI Documents Following Gabbard Criminal Referral On Russiagate Conspiracy
item.description: The request suggests that the DOJ is aggressively pursuing options to hold accountable any federal officials for their actions on Russiagate.

item.title: Judicial Activism Won’t Restore Planned Parenthood’s Federal Funding
item.description: Trump kept his promise to defund Big Abortion. Rogue judges can’t stop what Congress has done.
